meta.title: Software
meta.summary: Listing out my software notes in article form.

content:
Featured

I have a bunch of notes on random things I catalog here.

The article contents may stray from the page title.

Contact charles.karpati@gmail.com should you have any revisions, questions, comments, or concerns!


GitHub – Version control workflows, Git fundamentals, and GitHub usage. Notes


Colabs – Using Google Colab for development, collaboration, and experimentation. Notes


Shell Basics – Command-line operations and scripting essentials. Notes


APIs – Interfacing with APIs, requests, and data integration. Notes


Webscraping – Techniques to extract and process data from the web. Notes


nbdev – Literate programming and Python packaging using 

nbdev
. Notes


JavaScript Packages – Managing JS dependencies with npm, yarn, and bundlers. Notes


Cloud Functions – Deploying and managing serverless functions. Notes


Browser Extensions – Building and deploying browser-based extensions. Notes


Path – Handling filesystem paths and navigation programmatically. Notes


Termux – Using Termux for mobile-based Linux environments and development. Notes
